snippet: As the network chases ratings, two documentary series, “POV” and “Independent Lens,” could be sidelined.
abstract: Op-Ed article by television producer Norman Lear criticizes PBS for focusing on revenue-generating dramatic programming at expense of documentaries representing its public mission; notes PBS is threatening again to move documentary programs POV and Independent Lens to less desirable time slot; urges broadcaster to remain true to goals of expanding national dialogue on critical issues by keeping such shows in prime time.
lead_paragraph: As the network chases ratings, two documentary series, “POV” and “Independent Lens,” could be sidelined.
